ds_board_crw_planning.jql: project in (RACHEL, CRW) OR (project in (INTLY) AND labels = CRW) ORDER BY Rank ASC

ds_board_buildnext.jql: (project in (CRW) AND component in (build) AND status != Closed ORDER BY Rank ASC

ds_cdwtriage.description: Issues are New and have no target release set
ds_cdwtriage.jql: project = CRW AND status = New AND ('Target Release' is EMPTY OR 'CDW release' in ('?'))

ds_freeze.jql: ((project = CRW AND fixVersion in ( %(crw_freeze_versions)s )) OR (project = CRW AND fixVersion in ( %(crw_freeze_versions)s )))

ds_latest_freeze.jql: ((project = CRW AND fixVersion in ( %(crw_latest_freeze_versions)s )) OR (project = CRW AND fixVersion in ( %(crw_latest_freeze_versions)s )))

ds_lint_illegalfixversion.jql: (project = CRW AND (fixVersion in ( %(crw_bucket_versions)s ) OR fixVersion is EMPTY) OR project = CRW AND (fixVersion in ( %(crw_bucket_versions)s ) OR fixVersion is EMPTY)) AND resolution = done

ds_lint_nocomponent.jql: project in (CRW) and component is EMPTY AND resolution is EMPTY

ds_lint_unresolved_in_release.description: Unresolved issues in already released versions
ds_lint_unresolved_in_release.jql: project in (CRW) and fixVersion in releasedVersions() and resolution is empty

ds_maint.jql: ((project = CRW AND fixVersion in ( %(crw_maint_versions)s )) OR (project = CRW AND fixVersion in ( %(crw_maint_versions)s )))

ds_master.description: Current project+versions for CRW master stream
ds_master.jql: ((project = CRW AND fixVersion in ( %(crw_master_versions)s )) OR (project = CRW AND fixVersion in ( %(crw_master_versions)s )))

ds_mystuff.description: Issues assigned to current user or in a component lead by current user.

ds_needpmack.description: Product manager have not yet approved a jira with a target release
ds_needpmack.jql: 'Target Release' is not EMPTY AND 'CDW pm_ack' = '?' AND resolution = Unresolved

ds_next_maint.description: Issues for next development in maintenance or master
ds_next_maint.jql: ((project = CRW AND fixVersion in (  %(crw_next_maint_versions)s )) OR (project = CRW AND fixVersion in ( %(crw_next_maint_versions)s )))

ds_next_master.description: Issues for next development in maintenance or master
ds_next_master.jql: ((project = CRW AND fixVersion in (  %(crw_next_master_versions)s )) OR (project = CRW AND fixVersion in ( %(crw_next_master_versions)s )))

ds_respin.description: Issues included in a respin (has label containing 'respin-[a-k]')
